meanings.sent1: The children's laughter created a hubbub in the playground.
meanings.sent2: The city streets were filled with the hubbub of traffic.
meanings.sent3: Amidst the hubbub of the party, I lost my keys.
meanings.sent4: The hubbub of the bustling market was music to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The hubbub of the crowd made it hard to hear the speaker.

meanings.sent1: There was a hubbub in the classroom when the fire alarm went off.
meanings.sent2: The hubbub of conflicting opinions made it hard to make a decision.
meanings.sent3: In the hubbub of the kitchen, she accidentally added salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: The hubbub of thoughts in his mind kept him awake at night.
meanings.sent5: The hubbub of emotions clouded her judgment.
